Module roborally
Package client.view

Class OthersController

java.lang.Object
client.view.Controller
client.view.OthersController
public class OthersController
extends Controller
OthersController handles the HBox underneath the gameMat and creates as much little playerMats (onePlayer.fxml) as other player that joined and handles incoming protocol messages.
Author:
sarah

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  OthersController.OtherPlayer
    This private class represents the player that are not the player itself.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description

    This method stores all players of the game except the player itself.

    • playerAdded

      private void playerAdded​(Player player)
      This method creates the innerView of one player mat and adds it to the hBoxPlayer. Also it creates and adds an instance of the private class OtherPlayer and assigns the position in HBox.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that gets added
